post:
Dear LET Members,

We are from Pump Cloud, a Pump Inc brand.

Today we are bringing our Thanksgiving promo:

25% off all KVM VPS products! DOUBLE TRAFFIC!!

Coupon code: THANKSGIVING2016

Coupon valid until Cyber Monday

China Telecom CN2 is available in LA and Anti-DDoS GAME is available in Beauharnois and Strasbourg.

Windows OS is available on Plan 2 or higher plans.

Payments: PayPal, Alipay, Tenpay, Bitcoin, Credit Card (Visa, MC, AMEX, Discover, Unionpay, JCB, Diners Club)

Looking glass: [LA](http://lg-lax.pumpcloud.net)  [BHS](http://lg-bhs.pumpcloud.net)  [SBG](http://lg-sbg.pumpcloud.net)

1 vCPU Core @ 3.3GHz, 512MB RAM, 10GB SSD, 1TB traffic, 1Gbps uplink
